name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: [SOUND] So to summarize our discussion of recommender systems

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: in some sense the filtering task of recommended is easy and

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: in some other sense and the task is actually difficult.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _So its easy because the user dexpectations

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: the system takes initiative to push the information to the user.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: So the user doesn't really make an effort.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _So any recommendation is better than nothing

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _So unless you recommend that all the you know

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _noisy items or useless documents

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _some useful information uses general

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _So that's in that sense

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _However
column6: filtering is actually a much harder task. _

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _Because you have to make a binary decision
column6: and you can't afford waiting for _

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: a lot of items and then you will whether one item is better than others.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: You have to make a decision when you see this item.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: Let's think about news filtering as well as you see the news.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: And you have to decide whether the news would be interesting to a user.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _If you wait for a few days
column7: even if you can make accurate recommendation of _

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _the most relevant news
column6: only two days wouldn't be significantly decreased. _

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _Another reason why it's hard

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _If you think of this as a learning problem in collaborative filtering

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _example
column6: it's purely based on learning from the past ratings. _

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _So if you don't have many ratings
column6: there's really not much you can do

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: And may I just mention this problem.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: This is actually a very serious problem.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: But of course there are strategies that have been proposed to solve the problem.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _And there are

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: there are different strategies that we will use to alleviate the problem.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _We can use
column7: more user information to assess their similarity _

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: instead of using the preferences.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: Of these users on these items the immediate additional information or

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _better for about the user etcetera and

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: we also talked about the two strategies for filtering task.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: One is content based where we look at items in clarity you

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: know there's a clarity of filtering where we look at the user similarity.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: And they obviously can be combined.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _In a practical system
column7: they generally would have to be combined. _

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: So that will give us a hybrid strategy for filtering.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _A
column7: we also could recall that we _

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: talked about push versus pull as two strategies for

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: getting access to the text data.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _And recommend the system is it will help

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _And search engines are
column6: certain users in the pull mode. _

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _Of using the tool should be combined
column6: and they can be combined into have a system _

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: that can support user with multiple mode and formation access.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _So in the future
column6: we could anticipate for such a system to be more usable to a user. _

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: And also this is a active research area so

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _there are a lot of new algorithms being

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _In particular
column6: those new algorithms tend to use a lot of context information. _

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _Now the context here could be the context of the user

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: it could also be context of documents or items.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: The items are not isolated.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: They are connected in many ways.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _The users might form social network as well
column6: so there's a rich context there _

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: _that we can leverage in order to really solve the problem well

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: a active research area where also machine learning algorithms have been applied.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: Here are some additional readings in the handbook called Recommender Systems.

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: And has a collection of a lot of good articles that

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: can give you an overview of a number of specific

name: 5 - 14 - 4.7 Recommender Systems- Collaborative Filtering - Part 3 (00-04-45).srt
text: approaches to recommender systems.
